circularrendering.options.title: Circular Rendering
circularrendering.option.use_3d_circle.t: Use 3D spherical radius instead of 2D circular radius
circularrendering.option.radius_multipli: Adjust the radius of the circular render distance
circularrendering.option.vertical_cullin: Enable vertical distance culling in 3D mode
circularrendering.option.vertical_radius: Vertical render distance in blocks (3D mode only)
circularrendering.option.debug_mode.tool: Show debug information about rendered chunks
